channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Household waste pile dumped by postbox and thrwn over fence to allotment site. Including bike frame, fire extinguisher, vacuum, garbage etc, 27th September
item.description:
Appeared on night of 26th September, thrown over onto allotment plots and strewn across pavement. Junk from allotments added to the pile on the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Esmeralda Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Torn bin bags, 27th September
item.description:
People have put bin bags right outside our flat (not on bin day) and the bins are getting torn into by birds and foxes so trash is coming down the stairs into our basement flat (70 bridport place, basement flat).

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bridport Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting pollution in Albion Canal, 27th September
item.description:

item.title: Leftover Paint and Spillage. Please Clear, 27th September
item.description:
I noticed this morning that some of the tins of paint have been removed, which is great. However, there’s still a large tub of paint left behind, and there is paint spilled all over the floor. I’m not sure if the tub was missed during collection, or if someone else has since left it there, but could you please arrange for this to be cleared up properly?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Phelp Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
